title: Kronos Research Loses $26 Million in Unauthorized API Access Incident
description: According to Kronos Research, the crypto trading firm lost assets worth $26 million on Nov. 18 after an unknown party illegally accessed its application programming interface (API). Kronos Research claimed the losses associated with the unauthorized API access do not constitute “a significant portion” of its equity. Breach Does Not Affect Kronos’ Financial Standing On […]

title: Chinese Authority Warns of AIâ€™s Potential Security Disruption
description: China’s Ministry of State Security (MSS) has sounded the alarm on the latent threats lurking within the realm of Artificial Intelligence (AI). This warning, issued on Thursday, highlights the potential for AI to significantly reshape China’s national security landscape, raising concerns about data theft, cyber-attacks, economic vulnerabilities, and even military security.  As AI technologies, exemplified ...
